code: import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from"react";import LeftArrow from"../../assets/images/right.svg";import RightArrow from"../../assets/images/left.svg";import NotificationIcon from"../../assets/images/notification.svg";import SettingIcon from"../../assets/images/setting.svg";import"./index.scss";import{connect}from"react-redux";import{store}from"../../_helpers";import{playlistActions}from"../../_actions";var Header=function Header(_ref){var history=_ref.history,sidebar=_ref.sidebar;console.log(sidebar);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header headerBg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"arrows headerBg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:LeftArrow,className:"leftArrow arrow-size",onClick:function onClick(){history.goBack();}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:RightArrow,onClick:function onClick(){history.goForward();},className:"arrow-size"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"inputs headerBg",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"inputBox",placeholder:"Search for tracks, artist or album..."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"RightIcons headerBg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:NotificationIcon,className:"notification right-size"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:SettingIcon,className:"right-size",onClick:function onClick(){store.dispatch(playlistActions.sideBar(!sidebar));store.dispatch(playlistActions.playerBar(false));}})]})]})});};function mapStateToProps(state){console.log(state);var list=state.playList;return list;}export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header);
